def bitonic_generator(arr, n):
    even_placed = [arr[i] for i in range(0, n, 2)]
    odd_placed = [arr[i] for i in range(1, n, 2)]
    even_placed_sorted = sorted(even_placed)
    odd_placed_sorted = sorted(odd_placed, reverse=True)
    result = even_placed_sorted - odd_placed_sorted
    return result
